about_the_game:
From the developers of the critically-acclaimed A Fisherman’s Tale, embark on a thrilling adventure mixing action, puzzle and mystery. Travel between fictional worlds with wildly different visual styles, genres and gameplay. Solve the mysterious murder of best-selling but embittered gamebook author Jack Stevenson by diving headfirst into the grim and fantastical worlds of his Fiendish Fates© series.

EXPERIENCE A WIDE VARIETY OF ACTION & PUZZLE GAMEPLAY
Travel through 3 fantastical worlds from Jack’s Fiendish Fates book series, each featuring different themes and gameplay:
Magical sword in hand, slash your way through the necromantic Army of Evil, led by the demonic Grey Knight.
In Butchers of Orion, use your mind-powers and body-hopping abilities to escape the slaughterhouse spaceship of the life-sucking Lady Oriana and her drones.
Blast the corrupt guards of Sheriff Cassidy’s wasteland penitentiary with your shock-hand and trusty cyber-shooter in Prisoner of the Cyberhounds.

DISCOVER/UNVEIL THE MYSTERY OF THE AUTHOR’S DEATH
Witness Jack Stevenson’s personal rise and fall, as you explore his final and most intimate work.
Discover clues, secrets and personal notes to decipher the story behind the books and the true meaning of your journey through Jack’s fictional worlds.

PREPARE FOR A MIND-BENDING JOURNEY
Jack’s final masterpiece couldn’t really be complete without one of his world-famous twists. But he never expected this twist: the death of the author! Discover Jack’s true killer by exploring the grim and fantastical worlds of his Fiendish Fates gamebook series! Escape his stories’ perils through cracks in between the worlds! Exploit interdimensional portals to cross between place, time, and gameplay styles

Are you ready, adventurer? Your journey starts here!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit or newer
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 or greater
  • VR Support: SteamVR, OpenXR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit or newer
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 or greater
  • VR Support: SteamVR, OpenXR
